On the green area where kids play. Next to the bin.

item.title: Massive dog turn in the open grassy area between the children's play area and the alley behind Everest Road, 9th July
item.description:
Right where kids play. Disgusting and unhygienic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pilford Avenue, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: National Speed Limit signs, 9th July
item.description:
Reported now for the 3rd if not 4th time, why is this not fixed. The road should show that you can go up to 70mph.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is misaligned (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 9th July
item.description:
3 way traffic lights 28 day carriageway pothole size is approximately unable to mark up or photos 700x300x50mm tarmac patch (CW6 Pothole)

item.title: Long line of trees have low branches, overhanging the carriageway, making contact with double decker buses. Significant risk of bus windows smashing., 9th July
item.description:
The trees are lining the south side of Hatherley Road from the junction with Warden Hill Road to th ejunction with Belworth Drive. Difficult for buses to access the bus stop next to Hatherley Hall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped sofas, 9th July
item.description:

item.title: Broken paving slabs on Brunswick street, 9th July
item.description:
Outside 88 Brunswick st and nearby outside of 86 and 90 there are some broken paving slabs. It would be much appreciated if these could be replaced with like for like slabs and not tarmac as it would ruin the character of the street. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Brunswick Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes on clarington mews, 9th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Clarington Mews, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green traffic light not working., 9th July
item.description:
On Shurdington Road. It's the light on the left as you approach the insurance building on your left coming away from Cheltenham.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
